languages.text: "Утверждение ложно. Соседство и взаимодействие ксеноаугментов со священным металлом Бога-Машины вело к алгоритмическим парадоксам и проистекающему из них богохульству. Омниссия очищает и защищает". {n}Мехадендрит решительно клацает клешнями.{/n}

"This statement is false. The adjacency of xeno-augmetics to the sacred metal of the Machine God, and their interaction with it, resulted in algorithmic paradoxes and the blasphemous consequences thereof. The Omnissiah purifies and protects." {n}The mechadendrite clicks its claws resolutely.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно. Соседство и взаимодействие ксеноаугментов со священным металлом Бога-Машины вело к алгоритмическим парадоксам и проистекающему из них богохульству. Омниссия очищает и защищает". {n}Мехадендрит решительно клацает клешнями.{/n}

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。异形的植入物与万机之神的神圣金属有一定相似之处，这样的交互会导致算法方面的悖论，由此产生亵渎性的后果。愿欧姆尼塞亚净化一切，保护一切。”{n}机械触须上的爪子发出了果决的咔哒声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The adjacency of xeno-augmetics to the sacred metal of the Machine God, and their interaction with it, resulted in algorithmic paradoxes and the blasphemous consequences thereof. The Omnissiah purifies and protects." {n}The mechadendrite clicks its claws resolutely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。异形的植入物与万机之神的神圣金属有一定相似之处，这样的交互会导致算法方面的悖论，由此产生亵渎性的后果。愿欧姆尼塞亚净化一切，保护一切。”{n}机械触须上的爪子发出了果决的咔哒声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esa declaración es falsa. La adyacencia de xenoauméticos al metal sagrado del Dios Máquina y su mutua interacción ocasionó paradojas algorítmicas con consecuencias blasfemas. El Omnissiah purifica y protege». {n}La mecadendrita chasquea las garras con decisión.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The adjacency of xeno-augmetics to the sacred metal of the Machine God, and their interaction with it, resulted in algorithmic paradoxes and the blasphemous consequences thereof. The Omnissiah purifies and protects." {n}The mechadendrite clicks its claws resolutely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esa declaración es falsa. La adyacencia de xenoauméticos al metal sagrado del Dios Máquina y su mutua interacción ocasionó paradojas algorítmicas con consecuencias blasfemas. El Omnissiah purifica y protege». {n}La mecadendrita chasquea las garras con decisión.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は誤りだ。機械神の神聖な金属にゼノ・オーグメティックを隣接させ、それと相互作用させた結果、アルゴリズミック・パラドックスが生じ、神を冒涜する結果となった。万機神は浄化し、保護する」{n}機械触手が決然と爪を鳴らす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The adjacency of xeno-augmetics to the sacred metal of the Machine God, and their interaction with it, resulted in algorithmic paradoxes and the blasphemous consequences thereof. The Omnissiah purifies and protects." {n}The mechadendrite clicks its claws resolutely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は誤りだ。機械神の神聖な金属にゼノ・オーグメティックを隣接させ、それと相互作用させた結果、アルゴリズミック・パラドックスが生じ、神を冒涜する結果となった。万機神は浄化し、保護する」{n}機械触手が決然と爪を鳴らす。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Die Nähe der Xeno-Augmetik zum heiligen Metall des Maschinengotts sowie ihre Interaktion haben zu algorithmischen Paradoxen und deren blasphemischen Konsequenzen geführt. Der Omnissiah reinigt und schützt." {n}Der Mechadendrit klackert entschlossene mit den Klauen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The adjacency of xeno-augmetics to the sacred metal of the Machine God, and their interaction with it, resulted in algorithmic paradoxes and the blasphemous consequences thereof. The Omnissiah purifies and protects." {n}The mechadendrite clicks its claws resolutely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Die Nähe der Xeno-Augmetik zum heiligen Metall des Maschinengotts sowie ihre Interaktion haben zu algorithmischen Paradoxen und deren blasphemischen Konsequenzen geführt. Der Omnissiah reinigt und schützt." {n}Der Mechadendrit klackert entschlossene mit den Klauen.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Négatif. La présence de xéno-augmétiques à proximité du métal sacré du Dieu-Machine et les interactions avec ces membres ont entraîné des paradoxes algorithmiques aux conséquences blasphématoires. L'Omnimessie purifie et protège. » {n}La mécadendrite fait claquer ses pinces avec détermination.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The adjacency of xeno-augmetics to the sacred metal of the Machine God, and their interaction with it, resulted in algorithmic paradoxes and the blasphemous consequences thereof. The Omnissiah purifies and protects." {n}The mechadendrite clicks its claws resolutely.{/n}

The adjacency of xeno-augmetics to the sacred metal of the Machine God, and their interaction with it, resulted in algorithmic paradoxes and the blasphemous consequences thereof. The Omnissiah purifies and protects." {n}The mechadendrite clicks its claws resolutely.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Zeno ogmetikleri ile Makine Tanrı'nın kutsal metallerini yakın tutmak ve onları etkileşime sokmak, algoritmik paradokslara ve dolayısıyla da kâfirce çıktılara yol açar. Hermesih arındırır ve korur." {n}Mekadentritteki pençeler, kararlılıkla takırdıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The adjacency of xeno-augmetics to the sacred metal of the Machine God, and their interaction with it, resulted in algorithmic paradoxes and the blasphemous consequences thereof. The Omnissiah purifies and protects." {n}The mechadendrite clicks its claws resolutely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Zeno ogmetikleri ile Makine Tanrı'nın kutsal metallerini yakın tutmak ve onları etkileşime sokmak, algoritmik paradokslara ve dolayısıyla da kâfirce çıktılara yol açar. Hermesih arındırır ve korur." {n}Mekadentritteki pençeler kararlı bir edayla takırdıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
